package.name: Indie and punk carrier logos
package.shortDescription: A group of punk and indie logos to replace your carrier logo

descriptionlist.description: A group of punk and indie logos to replace your carrier logo - Aphex Twin, Black Flag, DKs, Nirvana, Pixies, Zappa, Spacemen 3, PiL, 4AD, K Records, Sub Pop and Ween. I'm happy to take requests if there are any bands you want to see featured

changelog.change: added a bunch of new icons
